item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: No disabled dropped kerb, 18th June
item.description:
The pavement at the newish flats on Maryon Road does not have a dropped kerb for disabled wheelchair users and blind people, at both ends of the pavement. Also, no tactile pavement slabs for blind people to know where the pavement starts or ends.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Maryon Road, Charlton Riverside, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous dumped lorry trailer, 18th June
item.description:
Has been reported several times L.A closed down as no further action .monday there was a RTA that was caused by the trailers position we rang bexleys highway department who failed to get back to us we have contacted the company on the side they have failed to respond Clipper Boulevard West Edisons Park, Crossways Business Park, Dartford DA2 6QJ +44 (0) 1322 277558 dartfordsales@daviesturner.co.uk trailer is on white cheverons and intruding into another lane and on a grass verge also is blocking site of the road warning signs so clear there is a case for removal and legal case as there are several vialations so we cant understand how the LA can close down
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hailey Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass on the slopes not cut again, 18th June
item.description:
Again the area is maintained only partially. The grass on the slopes is not cut causing H&S issues as well as allows people to dump more rubbish here. The dogs waste is not cleaned due to tall grass. As you see we have an excessive amount of areas for wild life here - and this is a RECREATION GROUND however due to poor maintenance we as the community cannot fully use it. In addition the edges used to be maintained for past 20 years! It is only recently you decided to skip this areas!!!!! Please can the gras on the WHOLE RECREATION ground TO BE CUT PROPERLY?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Petersham Drive, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet
